1.trip_description: Discover the Basque coast without missing the treasures and pleasures of Bordeaux, Bayonne on the way. End up at sophisticated San Sebastian.

2.trip_description: Find out why it's not a good idea to be in too much of a rush when heading for Barca. Take in Avignon, Arles, Nimes, Sete on the way

3.trip_description: Explore the Loire Valley famed for wine and castles but with other things to discover.

4.trip_description: Discover the favourite places and less well-known gems of Brittany

5.trip_description: Explore the one of the most underrated parts of France

6.trip_description: An amuse bouche around some inspirational places ending in the gastronomic capital of the World, Lyon.

7.trip_description: Visit some of the finest Roman sites in France

8.trip_description: Explore the mighty Rhone and the places it has shaped. From Paris take the train to Lyon then follow the river through Valence, Avignon, Tarascon and ending in Arles where it flows out into the Camargue. Hire a bike to visit the spectacular wetlands.
